channel.title: [Advice] My saradomin Zerker Shield [advice]
channel.description:
Ok to me i tried to make a saradomin zerker sheilld but it looks kinda odd to me tell m what im doing wrong or what i should add to it.. Tell what you like or dont like... Please dont flame...
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/saradomin.png[/img]
Ok heres the final!!! v2!!
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/saradominsheild.png[/img]
Thanks, Buddy

item.title: [Advice] My saradomin Zerker Shield [advice]
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

[quote=“Hellman1, post:29, topic:267218”][quote author=Assassins Creed Fan link=topic=352793.msg2709410#msg2709410
I am not posting a small cmment about a name.
I am just wondering what is so funny about My name ( Floris ).
Don’t try to smart-pants me because i am smarter & have more Common Sense then you
[/quote]

No problem kid,

Rofl, if you were smarter than me, you would be able to read right. I said “And if anyone gets mad cause someone makes a small comment about a name, they shouldn’t be on the internet anyway” Referring to my own comment about your name.

I’m sorry that my acronym hurt you. Please forgive me?

(And thanks for sticking up for me Budster :))[/quote]

Read full topic

And, nice shield, btw.
